author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
According to Mayor Brandon Johnson, he makes hiring decisions “solely on the basis of race." However, it turns out that that is not what you would call “legal.” Thus, the DOJ has announced that they have begun an investigation into these claims.

Breaking: The DOJ has opened an investigation into the city of Chicago after its woke mayor Brandon Johnson said that he hires more black people in his administration because they are better in character compared to other races. https://t.co/1zNjafkQ43
— Andy Ngo (@MrAndyNgo) May 19, 2025
title: Chicago's woke mayor says he only hires Blacks, now Trump's DOJ is taking him to court for discrimination

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Joy Reid is a lot of things, but “smart” is not one of them. That is because only someone objectively stupid can equate federal immigration enforcement to “snatching people off of the street and throwing them into grey vans and disappearing them across the country,” to send them to “gulags,” solely because of their “color,” or “ideology,” or “op ed they have written.”


Joy Reid says Trump is a fascist for deporting pedos, m*rderers, and gang members and wanting p**n out of schools

She’s not coping well… pic.twitter.com/wOTJDhbkuY
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) May 19, 2025
title: Joy Reid’s latest anti-Trump rant calls him a fascist for (checks notes) enforcing current laws

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It’s unclear how someone can feel accomplished or proud of “winning” when they did so through de facto cheating, but that is currently the world we live in, as one male athlete vowed to do just that.

Last week, AB Hernandez proclaimed he has no shame in his game and promised to steal titles away from hard-working female athletes, all to stick it to the haters. He has since made good on that promise and took first place at the CIF Southern Sectionals for the triple jump.


NEW: Biological male AB Hernandez proudly stands in the first-place position on the podium after beating the female competition at the CIF Southern Sectionals.

Hernandez won the girls' triple jump with a 41' 4" jump, 4 feet more than Reese Hogan, who got 2nd place.

Du
title: Trans Athlete Who Promised To Beat Women For The “Haters” Gets First Place In Sectionals

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Patel and Bongino said in an interview that Epstein did kill himself. Today’s show breaks down why we disagree.

According to The Daily Beast

Two of President Donald Trump‘s appointees to lead the Federal Bureau of Investigation firmly stated on Sunday that Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide, causing uproar from MAGA supporters on social media.

FBI director Kash Patel and deputy director Dan Bongino said in no uncertain terms on Fox News’ Sunday Morning Futures that the convicted pedophile took his own life as he was awaiting trial in 2019.
title: Watch: Dan Bongino and Kash Patel claim Epstein actually killed himself and we have A LOT of questions

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
When the left calls half the country a threat to Democracy, what they are really doing is projecting their insecurities onto the rest of the world. This is because psychological projection is a common trait among the most progressive politicians. So, when they call Trump literally Hitler, what they really mean is that they are the true threat to voter rights everywhere.

This is undeniable, especially after they created the most undemocratic election in American history. This is also why Bernie Sanders had no choice but to agree with the claim that "There has not been a fair primary since 2008."

title: Bernie Sanders admits OUT LOUD that Democrats are the ones who are a threat to democracy: "I'm not going to argue with that”

author: Brodigan
description:
Former Vice President Joe Biden’s cognitive decline is finally being acknowledged by Leftist media just in time to find out he’s been diagnosed with prostate cancer. Two massive elections took place in Europe this weekend. We’ll tell you what it means for Europe and, maybe, the rest of the world. FBI Director Kash Patel and Deputy Director Dan Bongino said in an interview that Epstein did, in fact, kill himself. We disagree.

JOE BIDEN’S COGNITION & CANCER

  • What a Prostate Cancer Diagnosis Like Biden’s Means for Patients
title: Sources: Joe Biden's Cancer Diagnosis Exposes Massive Coverup and Dan & Kash Confirm Epstein "Unaliving"

author: Brodigan
description:
I had this book marked prior to the announcement they "suddenly" discovered aggressive prostate cancer in Joe Biden. Who doesn't enjoy watching genderless potato head Brian Stelter get roasted and mashed? But in light of questions over just how much the media covered up Biden's cognitive decline, since Democrats lie knowing how most in the media will swear about it, you'd thinl CNN's "media watchdog" reporter would have something to say about the media dropping the ball.

ESPECIALLY when one of Stelter's CNN colleagues, Jake Tapper, wrote the book that drops tomorrow.

Here now is Mark Halperin:

He’s accused us of, you know, being propagandists, of celebrating cheap fakes and deep fakes. I don’t understand someone whose job it is
title: Reporter exposes "journalistic corruption" of genderless potatohead Brian Stelter over the Biden cognitive decline cover-up

author: Brodigan
description:
Late Sunday night, two days before the release of a book exposing the massive cover-up of Joe Biden's cognitive decline while President, it was announced that Biden has an aggressive form of prostate cancer. And if you don't find yourself questioning the timing enough, consider this video of Joe Biden in 2022 saying out loud, "I have cancer." At the time, we chalked it up to the cognitive decline that was being covered up.

Before we get into it, multiple things can be true. If you celebrate someone having cancer, you are a garbage person. You're also a complete fagtard if you say "yeah, but the political left says I can celebrate people dying" and would jump off a bridge if the political left told you not to, just to own the libs.

SEPARATE FROM THAT was the conversation we were already having about how much of Biden falling apa
title: Hey, remember when Joe Biden (accidentally?) admitted to having cancer in 2022?
